lexer.h

00001 //class for lexer. All the functions with handle* deal with indentifying a token. 
00002 
00003 class RpalLexer{
00004 public:
00005 
00006   RpalLexer(ifstream *fileHandle);  
00007   const Token *nextToken();
00008 
00009 private:
00010 
00011   //handles End Of File 
00012   void handleEOF(){
00013     if(invalidState())
00014       return;
00015 
00016     if(isEOF(fileHndl->peek())){
00017       buildManageTokens(Token::ENDOFFILE, "EOF");
00018     }
00019   };
00020 
00021   //handles operators
00022   //Operator -> Operator_symbol+ => ’<OPERATOR>’;
00023   //Operator_symbol
00024   //         -> ’+’ | ’-’ | ’*’ | ’<’ | ’>’ | ’&’ | ’.’
00025   //          | ’@’ | ’/’ | ’:’ | ’=’ | ’~’ | ’|’ | ’$’
00026   //          | ’!’ | ’#’ | ’%’ | ’ˆ’ | ’_’ | ’[’ | ’]’
00027   //          | ’{’ | ’}’ | ’"’ | ’‘’ | ’?’;
00028   //vector<char> operators(_ops,_ops +  sizeof(_ops)/sizeof(char));
00029   void handleOperators(){
00030     if(invalidState())
00031       return;
00032 
00033     if(isOperatorSymbol(fileHndl->peek())){
00034       do{
00035         readNextCharToStack();
00036       }while(isOperatorSymbol(fileHndl->peek()));
00037       string tokData = extractTokData();
00038       buildManageTokens(Token::OPERATOR, tokData);
00039     }
00040   };
00041     
00042   //handles punctions
00043   //Punction -> ’(’ => ’(’
00044   //       -> ’)’ => ’)’
00045   //       -> ’;’ => ’;’
00046   //       -> ’,’ => ’,’;
00047   void handlePunction(){
00048     if(invalidState())
00049       return;
00050         
00051     char nextChar = fileHndl->peek();
00052     if( isPunction(nextChar) )
00053       {
00054         readNextCharToStack();
00055         string tokData = extractTokData();
00056         buildManageTokens(Token::PUNCTION, tokData);
00057       }
00058   };
00059 
00060   //handles strings
00061   //String -> ’’’’
00062   //        ( ’\’ ’t’ | ’\’ ’n’ | ’\’ ’\’ | ’\’ ’’’’
00063   //        | ’(’     | ’)’     | ’;’     | ’,’
00064   //        | ’ ’
00065   //        | Letter | Digit | Operator_symbol
00066   //        )* ’’’’                                  => ’<STRING>’;
00067 
00068   //ascii 39 for \' (single quote)
00069   void handleStrings(){
00070     if(invalidState())
00071       return;
00072     
00073     char readChar;
00074     if(fileHndl->peek() == 39){
00075       do{
00076         //cout << "Read char is : " << fileHndl->peek() << endl;
00077         if(fileHndl->peek() != '\\'){//(read_char != '\''){
00078           readNextCharToStack();
00079           readChar = fileHndl->peek();
00080         }
00081         else{
00082           getEscapeSequence();
00083         }
00084       }while(fileHndl->peek() == 32 || isDigit(fileHndl->peek()) || isLetter(fileHndl->peek()) || isOperatorSymbol(fileHndl->peek()) || isPunction(fileHndl->peek()) || fileHndl->peek() == '\\');//read_char == 32 || isDigit(read_char) || isLetter(read_char) || isOperatorSymbol(read_char) || isPunction(read_char) || read_char=='\\');
00085       //ascii 32 stands for space
00086       //upon leaving the loop the next token should be end of string(single quote) 
00087         //cout << "coming out of the get string loop, fileHndl->peek() : " << fileHndl->peek() << " and read_char : "  << read_char  << endl ;
00088         if(fileHndl->peek() == 39){
00089         readNextCharToStack();
00090         string tokData = extractTokData();
00091         buildManageTokens(Token::STRING, tokData);
00092       }
00093       else{ 
00094         throw RpalError(RpalError::LEXER, "Expected ' but found " + itos(fileHndl->peek()));
00095       };
00096     };
00097   };
00098 
00099   void handleComments(){
00100     if(invalidState())
00101       return;
00102     
00103     char readChar = fileHndl->peek();
00104     if(readChar == '/'){
00105       readNextCharToStack();
00106       if(fileHndl->peek() == '/'){
00107         readNextCharToStack();
00108         while(isCommentCharacter(fileHndl->peek())){
00109           readNextCharToStack();
00110         }
00111         //after the loop check for end of line character else exception
00112         // ascii 10 
00113         if(fileHndl->peek() == '\n') 
00114           {
00115             readNextCharToStack();
00116             string tokData = extractTokData();
00117             buildManageTokens(Token::DELETE, tokData);
00118           }
00119         else{
00120           throw RpalError(RpalError::LEXER, "End of line character for comment not found");
00121         }
00122       }
00123       else{
00124         fileHndl->putback(readChar);//read_char has to be always '/' 
00125         //i think i have to empty the stack there case here is if the  has a single '/'
00126         charStack.pop();
00127       }
00128     }
00129   };
00130 
00131   //handles integers
00132   //Integer -> Digit+ => ’<INTEGER>’;
00133   void handleIntegers(){
00134     if(invalidState())
00135       return;
00136 
00137     if(isDigit(fileHndl->peek()))
00138       {
00139         do{
00140           readNextCharToStack();
00141         }while(isDigit(fileHndl->peek()));
00142         string tokData = extractTokData();
00143         buildManageTokens(Token::INTEGER, tokData);
00144       }
00145   };
00146   //handles whitespaces, Eof and tab spaces
00147   //Spaces -> ( ’ ’ | ht | Eol )+ => ’<DELETE>’;
00148   void handleSpaces(){
00149     if(invalidState())
00150       return;
00151 
00152     if (isWhiteSpaceOrEOL(fileHndl->peek())){
00153     do{
00154       readNextCharToStack();
00155     }while(isWhiteSpaceOrEOL(fileHndl->peek()));
00156     string tokData = extractTokData();
00157     buildManageTokens(Token::DELETE, tokData);
00158     };
00159   };
00160   //handles identifiers
00161   //Identifier -> Letter (Letter | Digit | ’_’)* => ’<IDENTIFIER>’;
00162   void handleIdentifier()
00163   {
00164     if(invalidState())
00165       return;
00166 
00167     if(isLetter(fileHndl->peek()))
00168       {
00169         do{
00170           readNextCharToStack();
00171         }
00172         while(isLetter(fileHndl->peek()) || isDigit(fileHndl->peek()) || fileHndl->peek() == '_');
00173         //empty the stack build a token and manage it
00174         string tokData =  extractTokData();
00175         buildManageTokens(Token::IDENTIFIER, tokData);
00176       }
00177     
00178   };
00179 
00180   
00181   void getEscapeSequence(){
00182     if(fileHndl->peek() == '\\'){
00183       readNextCharToStack();
00184       char read_char = fileHndl->peek();
00185       if(read_char == 't' || read_char == 'n' || read_char == '\\' || read_char == '\''){
00186         readNextCharToStack();
00187       }
00188       else{
00189         throw RpalError(RpalError::LEXER, "illegal token: illegal escape character" + itos(fileHndl->peek()));
00190       }
00191     }
00192   };
00193 
00194   bool invalidState() const{
00195     if(TOKENFOUND == currState)
00196       return true;
00197     else
00198       return false;
00199   };
00200 
00201   void setup(){
00202     initOperators();
00203     initTokens();
00204   };  
00205 
00206   void readNextCharToStack(){
00207     char temp[1];
00208     fileHndl->read(temp, 1);
00209     charStack.push(*temp);
00210   };
00211 
00212   //need to pass the type of identifier to be passed to buildManageTokens
00213   string extractTokData(){
00214     string tokData = "";
00215     while(!charStack.empty())
00216       {
00217         tokData.push_back(charStack.top());
00218         charStack.pop();
00219       }
00220     reverse(tokData.begin(), tokData.end());
00221     return tokData;
00222   };
00223 
00224   void buildManageTokens(int token_type, string temp){
00225     //cout << "building tok, type: " << itos(token_type) << " value: " << temp << endl;
00226     currState = TOKENFOUND;
00227     prev_tok = curr_tok;
00228     curr_tok = new Token(token_type, temp);
00229   };
00230 
00231   bool isEOF(int c) const{
00232     if(c == EOF)
00233       return true;
00234     else
00235       return false;
00236   };
00237   bool isLetter(int c) const{
00238     if((c >= 65 && c <= 90) || (c >= 97 && c<= 122) )
00239         return true;
00240     else
00241       return false;
00242   };
00243 
00244   bool isDigit(int c) const{
00245     if( c >= 48 && c <= 57)
00246       return true;
00247     else
00248       return false;
00249   };
00250 
00251   bool isWhiteSpaceOrEOL(char c) const{
00252     //9 for horizontal tab, 32 space, 10 for Line feed
00253     if( 9 == c ||  32 == c || 10 == c)
00254       return true;
00255     else
00256       return false;
00257   };
00258 
00259   void initOperators(){
00260     string op_str = "+,-,*,<,>,&,.,@,/,:,=,~,|,$,!,#,%,^,_,[,],{,},\",`,?";
00261     tokenize(op_str, ',', &operator_list);
00262   };
00263   
00264   void initTokens(){
00265     prev_tok = NULL;
00266     curr_tok = NULL;
00267   };
00268 
00269   //TODO not sure why the == for two strings and also the find on operator_list not working
00270   //inline functions
00271   inline bool isOperatorSymbol(int next_char) const{
00272     int i=0;
00273     bool is_operator = false;
00274     while(i < operator_list.size()){
00275       //why can't i store a vector of strings ?
00276       if(next_char == operator_list.at(i).at(0)){
00277         is_operator = true;
00278         break;
00279       };
00280       i = i+1;
00281     };
00282     return is_operator;
00283   };
00284   
00285   inline bool isPunction(char next_char) const{
00286     if('(' == next_char || ')' == next_char || ';' == next_char || ',' == next_char)
00287       return true;
00288     else
00289       return false;
00290   };
00291 
00292   inline bool isCommentCharacter(char chr){
00293     if('\'' == chr || isPunction(chr) || '\\' == chr || ' ' == chr || '\t' == chr || isLetter(chr) ||  isDigit(chr) || isOperatorSymbol(chr))
00294       return true;
00295       else
00296         return false;
00297   };
00298 
00299   void getNextToken(){
00300     currState = SEARCHING;
00301       handleEOF();
00302       handleIdentifier();
00303       handleIntegers();
00304       handleComments();
00305       handleOperators();
00306       handleStrings();
00307       handleSpaces();
00308       handlePunction();
00309   };
00310   const Token *getScreenedNextToken(){
00311     do{
00312       getNextToken();
00313     }while(!is_useful_token(curr_tok));
00314     return curr_tok;
00315   };
00316   bool is_useful_token(const Token *tok) const{
00317     if(Token::DELETE == tok->type()){
00318       return false;
00319     }
00320     else
00321       return true;
00322   };
00323 
00324   //members
00325   enum States {TOKENFOUND = 0, SEARCHING = 1};
00326   States currState;
00327   const Token *curr_tok, *prev_tok, *next_tok;
00328   vector<string> progContent;//fileContent
00329   ifstream * fileHndl;
00330   stack<char> charStack;//to store the input characters while making decisions
00331   vector<string> operator_list;
00332   char _ops[];
00333 };
